alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 9:22PM CDT until August 27 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 921 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Stonewall, or 14 miles south of Bossier City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coushatta, Ringgold, Martin, Hall Summit, Castor, Edgefield, Frierson, Caspiana, Grand Bayou, Taylortown, Lake Bistineau South, Elm Grove, Loggy Bayou, Womack, Ninock, Crichton, Robson, Mc Dade, and Armistead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River
